title: A NEW PROJECT
paragraph1: It is a period of civil war. Starting from a secret base, rebel ships attack and win their first victory against SWAPI.
paragraph2: During this battle, rebel spies manage to steal secret plans from SWAPI, an armored space station with enough data to build an entire application.
paragraph3: Pursued by the Empire's sinister agents, Princess Leia returns home aboard her starship with data to create rosters of movies and characters from that war, plus an incredible amount of stats to save her people and restore freedom. in the galaxy...
